reviewText: Good coverage of the injustice to Dreyfus
Excellent series with in-depth first person interviews. Highly Recommended!!!!!
This DVD is a must for anyone interested in the Dreyfus Affair, but only speaks English.
I found this dvd to be an excellent tool for teaching about the Dreyfus case. Well balanced presentation. Recommended for teachers and history buffs.
